author: Special Correspondent
text:
The All India Samathuva Makkal Katchi (AISMK) led by actor Sarath Kumar joined the National Democratic Alliance on Saturday.

BJP leaders said Mr. Sarath Kumar met Union Environment Minister Prakash Javadekar and sealed the deal.

The AISMK moved out of the AIADMK-led alliance last week. Recently, the party had faced a series of dissent within.

An MLA and a senior leader walked out.
title: AISMK joins NDA
